scripts.preinstall: cd .. && yarn link && npm i --only=prod && cd RNCMIFTest && yarn link react-native-color-matrix-image-filters
scripts.test: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android
scripts.build:android: detox build -c android.emu.debug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleAndroidTest
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean -project RNCMIFTest.xcodeproj -scheme RNCMIFTest -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO
scripts._infer:ios: cd ios && LD=/usr/bin/true infer run --keep-going -- xcodebuild -project RNCMIFTest.xcodeproj -scheme RNCMIFTest -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO
scripts.infer:ios:buildlog: cd ios && xcodebuild -project RNCMIFTest.xcodeproj -scheme RNCMIFTest -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO | tee xcodebuild.log
scripts.infer:ios:xcpretty: cd ios && xcpretty -r json-compilation-database -o compile_commands.json < xcodebuild.log > /dev/null
scripts.infer:ios: yarn clean:ios && yarn infer:ios:buildlog && yarn infer:ios:xcpretty && cd ios && infer run --keep-going --clang-compilation-db-files-escaped compile_commands.json

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -project ios/RNCMIFTest.xcodeproj -scheme RNCMIFTest -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -UseModernBuildSystem=NO
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 7
